decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled:

Application form; Block/ Site Plan; Site Location Plan; Proposed side elevation (Drawing number: ECDL/ E /P/0469/4) (Date:22.02.22); Proposed first floor and loft plan (Drawing number: ECDL/ E /P/0469/2) (Date:22.02.22); proposed ground floor plan (Drawing number: ECDL/ E /P/0469/1) (Date:22.02.22); Proposed front and rear elevation (Drawing number: ECDL/ E /P/0469/3) (Date:22.02.22);

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies  D1, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved rooflights to the side roofscopes and to the rear extension shall be conservation style and lie flush with the roof and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Single storey rear extension; single storey front porch, roof extension to rear (main) roof slope; and installation of one roof light to each side roof slope.
